items.title: Mammals were adapting from life in the trees to living on the ground before dinosaur-killing asteroid
items.description: More mammals were living on the ground several million years before the mass extinction event that wiped out the dinosaurs, new research has revealed.

items.title: Mpox could become a serious global threat, scientists warn
items.description: Mpox has the potential to become a significant global health threat if taken too lightly, according to scientists.
